meanings.definition: Highly pleasing to the taste; delicious.
meanings.sent1: The cake was delish and made everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: The pizza looked delish, so I couldn't resist a slice.
meanings.sent3: The delish cookies disappeared in seconds at the party.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the delish stew filled the entire house.
meanings.sent5: The ice cream was so delish that it felt like a dream.

meanings.sent1: She wore a delish dress that caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The sunset was delish, painting the sky in beautiful colors.
meanings.sent3: The delish movie had us laughing from start to finish.
meanings.sent4: The idea of a vacation sounded as delish as a gourmet meal.
meanings.sent5: The flowers in the garden looked so delish under the sunlight.
